epic_title: Secure Multi-Factor Authentication and Access Management
title: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)
description: As a security officer, I want a multi-factor authentication system, so that user accounts are protected with an additional layer of security.
attributes_and_rules: Must support multiple authentication methods, including SMS/email OTPs, authenticator apps, and biometrics.
acceptance_criteria: 1. User should receive OTP via chosen method. 2. System should validate OTP before granting access.
test_cases: Given a user with MFA enabled, when the user logs in, then they should be prompted for an OTP.

epic_title: Secure Multi-Factor Authentication and Access Management
title: Ensure Compliance with Financial Security Regulations
description: As an administrator, I want the authentication system to comply with financial security regulations, so that customer data is securely protected.
attributes_and_rules: System must employ encryption and anti-phishing measures.
acceptance_criteria: 1. All data transmissions must be encrypted. 2. Anti-phishing measures must be implemented.
test_cases: Given the authentication process, when a user logs in, then the system should ensure all data is encrypted and anti-phishing measures are active.

title: Build a Responsive User Interface
description: As a product manager, I want a responsive UI, so that customers can access the portal seamlessly from any device.
attributes_and_rules: UI must adapt to desktops, tablets, and mobile phones.
acceptance_criteria: 1. UI should be responsive across all device types. 2. Navigation should be simple and user-friendly.
test_cases: Given a customer accessing the portal from any device, when they navigate through the portal, then the UI should adapt seamlessly.

title: Ensure Accessibility Compliance
description: As an accessibility advocate, I want the portal to comply with accessibility standards, so that it is usable for people with disabilities.
attributes_and_rules: UI must comply with accessibility standards such as WCAG.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Portal must meet WCAG standards. 2. UI elements must be easily navigable with assistive technologies.
test_cases: Given a customer using assistive technologies, when they access the portal, then the UI should be fully navigable and compliant with accessibility standards.

title: Display User Account Details on Dashboard
description: As a customer, I want to see my account details on the dashboard, so that I have an overview of my financial status.
attributes_and_rules: Dashboard must display account balances, recent transactions, and key alerts.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Dashboard should display up-to-date account information. 2. Customers must see recent transactions and balances.
test_cases: Given a customer with active accounts, when they view the dashboard, then they should see accurate and up-to-date account details.

title: Provide Personalized Service Recommendations
description: As a customer, I want personalized service recommendations, so that I can access relevant banking services.
attributes_and_rules: Recommendations must be based on profile information and eligibility.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Recommendations must be relevant to user profile. 2. Recommendations should enhance user engagement.
test_cases: Given a customer profile, when the dashboard presents recommendations, then they should be relevant and personalized.

epic_title: Digital Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
title: Enable Digital Account Opening
description: As a new customer, I want to open a new account online, so that I can start banking without visiting a branch.
attributes_and_rules: Workflows must include form auto-population and input validation.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Form should auto-populate known customer details. 2. System must validate inputs for accuracy.
test_cases: Given a new customer applying for an account, when they use the digital workflow, then the system should guide them through a validated process.

epic_title: Digital Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
title: Streamline Service Modification Requests
description: As a customer, I want to modify my existing services online, so that I can manage my services without branch visits.
attributes_and_rules: Process must be efficient and paperless, ensuring compliance checks.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Workflow must be compliant. 2. Customers should track request progress.
test_cases: Given a customer modifying services, when they use the workflow, then they should experience an efficient and compliant process.

title: Allow Saving and Resuming of Applications
description: As a customer, I want to save my incomplete application, so that I can resume and complete it later.
attributes_and_rules: System should auto-save and encrypt draft details.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Incomplete details must be auto-saved securely. 2. Customers should resume from the last completed step.
test_cases: Given an incomplete application, when the customer returns, then they should resume from where they left off securely.

title: Implement Secure Document Upload
description: As a customer, I want to upload documents securely, so that my identity verification and application can be processed.
attributes_and_rules: System must validate, encrypt, and allow the tracking of document statuses.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Uploads must meet format and size validations. 2. Customers should track document status in the workflow.
test_cases: Given document uploads, when customers submit documents, then the system should validate, encrypt, and track them securely.

title: Provide Real-Time Request Tracking
description: As a customer, I want to track my request's status in real-time, so that I am informed about its progress.
attributes_and_rules: System must generate notifications for status changes and provide visibility.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Customers must receive notifications on status changes. 2. System should provide real-time visibility into request statuses.
test_cases: Given a submitted request, when its status changes, then customers should receive real-time notifications and see updated status.

epic_title: Comprehensive Interaction History and Audit Trail
title: Maintain User Activity Logs
description: As an auditor, I want a comprehensive log of user activities, so that I can ensure compliance and resolve disputes.
attributes_and_rules: System must record all user actions and provide secure administrator access.
acceptance_criteria: 1. All user actions must be logged consistently. 2. Admins should securely access audit trails.
test_cases: Given user activities, when recorded, then the system should generate consistent logs accessible to authorized administrators.

title: Develop Core Banking Integration APIs
description: As a systems integrator, I want to build integration APIs, so that the self-service portal synchronizes data with core banking systems.
attributes_and_rules: APIs must enable real-time data synchronization in compliance with security standards.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Data must flow bi-directionally in real-time. 2. Integration must meet security and operational standards.
test_cases: Given core banking data, when accessed via API, then the portal should synchronize data in real-time securely.

epic_title: Independent Portal Database and Performance Optimization
title: Set Up High-Performance Portal Database
description: As a database administrator, I want a dedicated database for portal operations, so that the system remains responsive and reliable.
attributes_and_rules: Database must support high concurrency, indexing, caching, and query optimization.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Portal database must handle high user loads efficiently. 2. Database must support automated failover for reliability.
test_cases: Given heavy user loads, when the database operates, then it should remain fast and reliable with optimized performance.

epic_title: Role-Based Access Control and Authorization Management
title: Implement Role-Based Access Control
description: As a security officer, I want a role-based access control system, so that user access is restricted according to roles.
attributes_and_rules: Permissions must be assigned based on user roles, enforcing the principle of least privilege.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Users must access only relevant functions based on roles. 2. System must enforce least privilege principle.
test_cases: Given different user roles, when accessing the system, then users should only access permitted functions.
